english.segment1: Just a small town girl. Livin' in a lonely world. She took the midnight train goin' anywhere
english.segment2: Just a city boy. Born and raised in south Detroit. He took the midnight train goin' anywhere
english.segment3: A singer in a smoky room. A smell of wine and cheap perfume. For a smile they can share the night. It goes on and on and on and on
english.segment4: Strangers waiting. Up and down the boulevard. Their shadows searching in the night. Streetlight people. Living just to find emotion. Hiding somewhere in the night
english.segment5: Working hard to get my fill. Everybody wants a thrill. Payin' anything to roll the dice. just one more time
english.segment6: Some will win, some will lose. Some were born to sing the blues. Oh, the movie never ends. It goes on and on and on and on
english.segment7: Strangers waiting. Up and down the boulevard. Their shadows searching in the night. Streetlight people. Living just to find emotion. Hiding somewhere in the night
english.segment8: Don't stop believin'. Hold on to that feelin'. Streetlight people
english.segment9: Don't stop believin'. Hold on. Streetlight people
english.segment10: Don't stop believin'. Hold on to that feelin'. Streetlight people
